deletepage-deletestory: Text of checkbox above confirm button in delete page to delete all linked stories.
wikistories-beta-feature-message: Title of the beta feature to show stories on article pages.
wikistories-beta-feature-description: Description of the beta feature to show stories on article pages.
prefs-wikistories: Section title for the Wikistories preferences on the 'appearance' preferences tab.
wikistories-pref-showdiscovery-message: Description of the Wikistories preference to show the discovery section on articles.
wikistories-pref-showdiscovery-help-mess: Help message of the Wikistories preference to show the discovery section on articles.
wikistories-recentchangesflags-letter: Flag (letter) to show on Recent Changes next to the lines that represent edit to stories associated with articles
wikistories-recentchangesflags-title: Title (tooltip) to show the Recent Changes Wikistories flag letter
wikistories-recentchangesflags-legend: Legend of the Recent Changes Wikistories flag letter
wikistories-rcfilters-hidewikistories-la: Label of the RC filter to show edits to wikistories on articles
wikistories-rcfilters-hidewikistories-de: Description of the RC filter to show edits to wikistories on articles
storybuilder: Name of the Story Builder special page as listed on Special:SpecialPages
wikistories-specialstorybuilder-title: Title of the special page to create a story.
wikistories-specialstorybuilder-loading: Temporary message indicating that the story builder is currently loading on Special:StoryBuilder
wikistories-specialstorybuilder-nojswarn: Message indicating that JavaScript is required to use Special:StoryBuilder
wikistories-specialstorybuilder-mustbelo: Message indicating that the user needs to be logged in to use the Story Builder.
wikistories-specialstorybuilder-invalids: Message indicating that no subpage or an invalid subpage was supplied in the URL.
wikistories-search-inputplaceholder: Text used as placeholder for the input bar in Search view
wikistories-search-cuetext: Message shown when no search input has been provided by user in Search view
wikistories-search-noresultstext: Message shown when no results are found for user input in Search view
wikistories-search-navigator-title: Title for Navigator component when used in Search view
wikistories-search-navigator-title-selec:
Title for Navigator component when images are selected in Search view.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of images selected
wikistories-story-goto-publish:
Text for a button in the Story view to continue to publish step
{{identical|Next}}
wikistories-story-selecttext: Text used for an text selection button in the CurrentFrame view
wikistories-story-edittext-duplicate: Text message for editing guiding feedback when duplicate story text is found
wikistories-story-edittext-outdated: Text message for editing guiding feedback when the text appears to be outdated with regards to the article text
wikistories-story-edittext-done: Text used for a done selection button in the Navigator when editing story text
wikistories-story-edittext-initial: Initial text message for editing guiding feedback
wikistories-story-edittext-medium: Text message for editing guiding feedback when user starts editing
wikistories-story-edittext-last: Text message for editing guiding feedback when edit threshold is met
wikistories-story-replaceimage: Text used for the menu option to replace an image in the Story view
wikistories-story-deleteframe: Text used for the menu option to delete a story frame in the Story view
wikistories-story-feedback: Text used for the menu option to go to the Wikistories project talk page
wikistories-story-navigator-title: Title for Navigator component in the Story view when creating a new story
wikistories-story-navigator-title-edit: Title for Navigator component in the Story view when editing an existing story
wikistories-story-navigator-title-editte: Title for Navigator component in the Story view when editing the text
wikistories-imageattribution-author-unkn: Text used in the ImageAttribution component when the image author is unknown
wikistories-article-navigator-title: Title for Navigator component when used in Article view
wikistories-article-loading: Text used for a header in the Article view as the article loads
wikistories-article-usetext: Text used for a button in the Article view.
wikistories-article-info-banner-sentence: Text used for the info section in the Article view as the feature introduction
wikistories-alert-okbuttontext: Text of the OK button on the generic alert dialog.
wikistories-confirmdialog-cancel: Label of the cancel button of the confirm dialog in Story view
wikistories-confirmdialog-ok:
Label of the OK button of the confirm dialog in Story view
{{identical|OK}}
wikistories-confirmdialog-delete-title: Title for the confirm dialog to delete a story page in Story view
wikistories-confirmdialog-delete-message: Text message for the confirm dialog to delete a story page in Story view
wikistories-confirmdialog-delete-accept:
Text for the button to confirm deleting a story page in Story view.

{{Identical|Delete}}
wikistories-confirmdialog-discardstory-t: Title for the confirm dialog to discard a whole Wikistory in Story view
wikistories-confirmdialog-discardstory-m: Text message for the confirm dialog to discard a whole Wikistory in Story view
wikistories-confirmdialog-discardedits-t: Title for the confirm dialog to discard edits made to a story
wikistories-confirmdialog-discardedits-m: Text message for the confirm dialog to discard edits make to a story
wikistories-confirmdialog-discardstory-a: Text for the button to confirm discarding a whole Wikistory in Story view.
wikistories-storyviewer-textsize-title: Title of the textsize dialog in the Story Viewer
wikistories-storyviewer-textsize-label-s:
Label of the radio button to set the text size to 'small' in the text size dialog in the Story Viewer
{{identical|Small}}
wikistories-storyviewer-textsize-label-r: Label of the radio button to set the text size to 'regular' in the text size dialog in the Story Viewer
wikistories-storyviewer-textsize-label-l:
Label of the radio button to set the text size to 'large' in the text size dialog in the Story Viewer
{{identical|Large}}
wikistories-toast-maxframes-addingmore:
Text message for the toast warning when trying to add more frames beyond the max limit from Story view.

Parameters:
* $1 - maximum number of frames allowed
wikistories-toast-maxframes-selecting:
Text message for the toast warning when trying to select more images beyond the max limit from the Search view.

Parameters:
* $1 - maximum number of frames allowed
wikistories-error-notenoughframes-title: Title of the error dialog when trying to publish a story that doesn't have enough frames.
wikistories-error-notenoughframes-messag:
Error message when trying to publish a story that doesn't have enough frames.

Parameters:
* $1 - minimum number of pages for a story
* $2 - number of pages missing
wikistories-error-frameswithouttext-titl: Title of the error dialog when trying to publish a story that is missing text in some pages.
wikistories-error-frameswithouttext-mess:
Error message when trying to publish a story that is missing text in some pages.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of pages without text
wikistories-builder-article-not-availabl: Text of the article page when article is not available from Wikipedia
wikistories-builder-publishform-navigato: Title for Navigator component when used in PublishForm view
wikistories-builder-publishform-placehol: Placeholder of the story title text input on the publish form.
wikistories-builder-publishform-summary-: Label of the story summary text input on the publish form.
Placeholder of the story summary text input on the publish form.
wikistories-builder-publishform-publishb: Text of the publish button on the publish form.
wikistories-builder-publishform-info: Information section about where will the published story be available.
wikistories-builder-publishform-invalidt: Error message when no story title is provided on the publish form.
Error message when the provided story title is invalid.
Error message when trying to create a story with a title that already exists.
Error message when trying to edit a story but a story with the given title doesn't seem to exist.
wikistories-builder-publishform-saveerro: Error message when the publish request fails
wikistories-builder-publishform-saving: Text shown while the app is attempting to save and publish story
wikistories-builder-publishform-watch: Label of the checkbox to watch the story on the publish form
wikistories-builder-publishform-saving-d: Congratulation message on the publish form after a story has been successfully published.
wikistories-builder-publishform-gotostor: Button text to view the story that has been published
wikistories-builder-publishform-sharesto: Button text to share the story that has been published
wikistories-builder-licensing-with-terms:
Text notifying user of licenses that story will be published under.
Parameters:
* $1 - terms of service URL
* $2 - CC-BY-SA 3.0 license URL
* $3 - GFDL license URL
wikistories-nojs-form-label-related-arti: Text for the no js form input label for related article
wikistories-nojs-form-label-frame:
Text for the no js form input label for frame.
Parameters:
* $1 - Frame number, starting at 1
wikistories-nojs-form-label-image:
Text for the no js form input label for image

{{Identical|Image}}
wikistories-nojs-form-label-text: Text for the no js form input label for text
wikistories-nojs-form-categories-title: Title of the form section for categories
wikistories-nojs-form-categories-label: Label of the text area to edit story categories
wikistories-nojs-viewer-error:
Text for missing images error message.
Parameters:
* $1 - Number of images missing
wikistories-nojs-viewer-no-article: Text for no article linked to story
wikistories-discover-cta-text: Text for a button in the Discover section to start the builder step
wikistories-discover-cta-text-subheader: Subheader text for a button in the Discover section to start the builder step
wikistories-storyviewer-next-story-heade: Text for the header on next story page
wikistories-storyviewer-next-story-viewt:
Text for the view cta on next story page
{{identical|View}}
wikistories-storyviewer-textsize: Text for the button to change text size in the viewer
wikistories-storyviewer-edit: Text for the button to edit a story from the viewer
wikistories-storyviewer-talk: Text for the button to go to the story talk page
wikistories-storyviewer-cover-page-headi: Heading text to accompany the story title for each cover page at the beggining of each story in the viewer
wikistories-file-not-found:
Error message when a file used in a story is not found in any known repo.
Parameters:
* $1 - name of the file
wikistories-from-article-not-found:
Error message when the specific related article doesn't exist.
Parameters:
* $1 - article title
wikistories-invalid-format: Error message when the story does not conform to the schema
wikistories-not-enough-frames: Error message when the story does not have enough frames
wikistories-too-many-frames: Error message when the story has too many frames
wikistories-text-too-long:
Error message when the text on a frame is too long.
Parameters:
* $1 - index of the frame (starting at 1)
* $2 - Length of the text
* $3 - Maximum length allowed
wikistories-no-image-category: Tracking Categories for story no image found
wikistories-no-image-category-desc: Description of the Tracking Categories for story no image found
wikistories-no-related-article: Tracking Categories for story has no related article
wikistories-no-related-article-desc: Description of the Tracking Categories for story has no related article
wikistories-outdated-text-category: Tracking Categories for story with outdated text
wikistories-outdated-text-category-desc: Description of the Tracking Categories for story with outdated text
echo-category-title-wikistories-action: Label for the Wikistories notification category on Special:Preferences
wikistories-notification-articlechanged-:
Main message for the notification indicating that a story needs to be reviewed following an article edit.
Parameters:
* $1 - Title of the article that was edited
* $2 - Title of the story that needs to be reviewed
